Detailed Description

Stores a set of interaction mesh representing a motion.

void roboptim::retargeting::AnimatedInteractionMesh::computeVertexWeights ( )

Compute current edges weights based on vertices positions.

Each time a vertex position is updated the weights are invalidated and should be recomputed.

References graph(), interactionMeshes(), roboptim::retargeting::Vertex::positions, and roboptim::retargeting::InteractionMeshEdge::weight.

Referenced by recomputeCachedData().

Eigen::VectorXd& roboptim::retargeting::AnimatedInteractionMesh::state ( ) [inline]

Access the interal vector directly.

Warning: this API is unsafe, it is your responsibility to update edges weights if you modify the state manually.
